pr_title: [BEAM-9891] TPC-DS module initialization, tables and queries stored

timeline.message: Added initial tests for TPC-DS on both direct runner and dataflow runner
[BEAM-9891] TPC-DS module init, table schemas and queries stored

timeline.bodyText: Just curious about this. Is this because autoCastField is how CSV is converted to INT64? I happen to be looking at other things and found this.
timeline.author: kennknowles

replies.bodyText:
Yes, data in format of CSV files are read by this autoCastField method and converted to various types.
When input data field is empty, it needs to be treated as NULL manually, otherwise it will cause error.
replies.author: Imfuyuwei

timeline.bodyText: Just curious that any reason that this module doesn't use applyJavaNature? And do we want to publish this module into maven central when releasing beam?
